data.message: Hello Facebook I want to report abuse and abusive person on Facebook. The name she is under is Sandy Shaw she has threaten me and has others also threatened me on Facebook messager there is one for sure. Sandy Shaw has threaten me on my own phone with texts so Facebook can't see her behavior but you will definitely see the abuse on Facebook messager. If you would like the names of others message me or get ahold of me on Facebook somehow. I have proof she has been doing this to me and probably other people to. If there is something you want me to do to get you more proof I can do that for you. Please contact me right away. She has to be stopped now.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Robyn. If you feel you're in immediate danger, please contact your local authorities. Depending on the seriousness of the situation, you can learn more about the tools Facebook offers to help you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/29kzNK8. You can also find more information, tools and resources on our Bullying Prevention Hub here: http://bit.ly/29lwvCK. -Jordan
